General.Name: Shanghai Industrial Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Industrial Development Co.,Ltd engages in the real estate development, operation, and management businesses in China. It is also involved in the provision of information consulting services related to real estate business. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Mr. Qingyuan  Lu
1.Title: Gen. Mang. of Property Operations and Member of the Supervisory Board
